Questions.question: Which one is the religious tallest minar in India ?
Questions.information: The Fateh Burj (English: The Victory Tower) is the tallest religious minar in India situated in the historical village of Chappar Chiri in the SAS Nagar district, Punjab. It was completed in 2011.

Questions.information: Inventor Ralph Baer, The 'Father Of Video Games,' Dies At 92. German-American game developer Ralph Baer shows the prototype of the first games console which was invented by him during a press conference on the Games Convention Online in Leipzig, Germany in 2009.
